Package org.ro.tuc.pt.business

Class DeliveryService

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
org.ro.tuc.pt.business.DeliveryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeliveryServiceProcessing
public class DeliveryService
extends java.util.Observable
implements IDeliveryServiceProcessing
Class is used to manage the application functionality for managing products and orders. It extends Observable (to notify the employees when new orders are placed), and implements IDeliveryServiceProcessing.
Invariant for the class:
wellFormed()

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DeliveryService()
    The constructor initalizes the set of products and the set of orders.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeliveryService

      public DeliveryService()
      The constructor initalizes the set of products and the set of orders. The wellFormed() method must return true

  • Method Details

    • generateReport

      public int generateReport​(java.lang.String time1, java.lang.String time2, java.lang.String times, java.lang.String nrOrders, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String date, java.util.HashSet<User> users)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Generates the report requested by the administrator in a .txt file. It also checks for the input to be correct.
      Specified by:
      generateReport in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      time1 - in the format "hh:mm"
      time2 - in the format "hh:mm"
      times - integer greater than 0
      nrOrders - integer greater than 0
      value - integer greater than 0
      date - in the format "yyyy-mm-dd"
      users - the set of users from the application
      Returns:
      0 if the report was generated and -1 if the input was incorrect

    • importProducts

      public void importProducts()
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Reads the base products from the file "products.csv" and deletes all existent composite products.
      Specified by:
      importProducts in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing

    • searchProducts

      public int searchProducts​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String rating, java.lang.String calories, java.lang.String protein, java.lang.String fat, java.lang.String sodium, java.lang.String price)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Searches for the products using the filters introduced by the user.
      Specified by:
      searchProducts in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      title - any String
      rating - greater than 0
      calories - greater than 0
      protein - greater than 0
      fat - greater than 0
      sodium - greater than 0
      price - greater than 0
      Returns:
      -1 if the searched was performed, 0 if the input was incorrect and 1 if no filter was given by the user

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder​(User user)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Creates a new order and adds it to the set of orders. Creates a bill in a .txt file. Notifies the employees that a new order was placed.
      Specified by:
      placeOrder in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      user - the user that placed the order.

    • addBaseProduct

      public int addBaseProduct​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String rating, java.lang.String calories, java.lang.String protein, java.lang.String fat, java.lang.String sodium, java.lang.String price)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Creates a new base product and adds it to the products set if the input is correct.
      Specified by:
      addBaseProduct in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      title - any String
      rating - greater than 0
      calories - greater than 0
      protein - greater than 0
      fat - greater than 0
      sodium - greater than 0
      price - greater than 0
      Returns:
      -1 if the product was successfully added, 0 if the title was empty, 1 if the rating couldn't be converted into a float, 2 if the calories couldn't be converted into an integer, 3 if the protein couldn't be converted into an integer, 4 if the fat couldn't be converted into an integer, 5 if the sodium couldn't be converted into an integer, 6 if the price couldn't be converted into an integer

    • updateBaseProduct

      public int updateBaseProduct​(BaseProduct oldProduct, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String rating, java.lang.String calories, java.lang.String protein, java.lang.String fat, java.lang.String sodium, java.lang.String price)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Modifies the values of the oldProduct to the ones given as parameters if they are correct, and also modifies all composite products containing it.
      Specified by:
      updateBaseProduct in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      oldProduct - product to be modified
      title - any String
      rating - greater than 0
      calories - greater than 0
      protein - greater than 0
      fat - greater than 0
      sodium - greater than 0
      price - greater than 0
      Returns:
      -1 if the product was successfully updated, 0 if the title was empty, 1 if the rating couldn't be converted into a float, 2 if the calories couldn't be converted into an integer, 3 if the protein couldn't be converted into an integer, 4 if the fat couldn't be converted into an integer, 5 if the sodium couldn't be converted into an integer, 6 if the price couldn't be converted into an integer

    • deleteBaseProduct

      public void deleteBaseProduct​(BaseProduct baseProduct)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • addCompositeProduct

      public void addCompositeProduct​(CompositeProduct compositeProduct)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Adds a new composite prduct to the set of products.
      Specified by:
      addCompositeProduct in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      compositeProduct - the product to be added. It was previously created and added a new base product each time the administrator performed the operation, prior to requesting the save of the resulted composite.
